mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS user_id, b.title AS product_title, b.price AS product_price, c.nickname AS writer_nickname, c.id AS author_id, d.upload_file_name AS product_image FROM wish_list a JOIN product b ON a.product_id = b.id JOIN user c ON b.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN product_photos d ON b.id = d.product_id AND d.thumbnail IS NOT NULL WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.created_at desc limit #{size} offset #{offset} ;

SELECT count(*) FROM wish_list a JOIN product b ON a.product_id = b.id JOIN user c ON b.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN product_photos d ON b.id = d.product_id AND d.thumbnail IS NOT NULL WHERE a.user_id = #{userId};
select * from wish_list where user_id = #{userId} and product_id = #{productId};
